newsitem.title: USA: Sudbury Aug 31 Q1 shr $0.21 vs $0.21.
newsitem.headline: Sudbury Aug 31 Q1 shr $0.21 vs $0.21.

text.p: (All Data Above 000s Except Per Share Numbers) NOTE: Fiscal 1996 first quarter sales includes $6.0 million in sales reported in from sale of company's South Coast Terminals subsidiary in December 1995.

Included in fiscal first quarter 1996 was a net benefit of $452,000 resulting from income from South Coast and expense associated with a contractual bonus for the company's chairman and chief executive officer, Jack Sardas, which was finalized in January 1996.
The company said earnings growth on a two percent higher share base was helped by lower interest expense, mostly from lower debt levels.
